Tag.description: A custom key-value pair associated with a resource within your organization.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

type.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The string value that's associated with the key of the tag. You can set the value of a tag to an empty string, but you can't set the value of a tag to null.

type.description: The string value that's associated with the key of the tag. You can set the value of a tag to an empty string, but you can't set the value of a tag to null.

resource.description: You can use AWS::Organizations::ResourcePolicy to delegate policy management for AWS Organizations to specified member accounts to perform policy actions that are by default available only to the management account.

properties.name: Content
properties.description: The policy document. For AWS CloudFormation templates formatted in YAML, you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format. AWS CloudFormation always converts a YAML policy to JSON format before submitting it.

types.description: The policy document. For AWS CloudFormation templates formatted in YAML, you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format. AWS CloudFormation always converts a YAML policy to JSON format before submitting it.

The policy document. For AWS CloudFormation templates formatted in YAML, you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format. AWS CloudFormation always converts a YAML policy to JSON format before submitting it.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of tags that you want to attach to the resource policy

type.description: A list of tags that you want to attach to the resource policy

attributes.description: You can use AWS::Organizations::ResourcePolicy to delegate policy management for AWS Organizations to specified member accounts to perform policy actions that are by default available only to the management account.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource policy.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource policy.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The unique identifier (ID) associated with this resource policy.

type.description: The unique identifier (ID) associated with this resource policy.
